## characterToCodepoint() function

UTF8 字符转为 Unicode 码点。

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function characterToCodepoint(character: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  character | string | 字符，支持多个字符，返回的码点将以 <code>-</code> 分割 |

**Returns:**

string
